GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of usernames for all users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves up a user object for a given username

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of stubs for all articles

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Adjusts the 'vote' property of the specified article by a set amount (can be negative) and serves up the updated article
